extends TwoDShape

        Constructor for Rectangle object
        Parameters:
        xCoord - xcoord for rectangle to be drawn at
        yCoord - ycoord for rectangle to be drawn at
        name - the name of the rectangle
        c - color for rectangle to be drawn in
        side1 - length of the rectangle
        side2 - width of the rectangle
